Class FileFinder

  • java.lang.Object
    • FileFinder

  • public class FileFinder
extends java.lang.Object
    FileFinder will recursively search through files in a supplied directory and store them in an ArrayList

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.util.List<java.io.File> files
      ArrayList to store all the files found in a directory
      private long totalSpace
      Total space of all the files found in bytes

      long getTotalSpace()

      Recursive function to add files recursively to an ArrayList

    • Constructor Detail

      • FileFinder

        public FileFinder(java.lang.String path)
        Parameters:
        path - to the directory to recursively search through via searchFiles(File). Use getter method to retrieve the files. List will be null if path supplied is not compatible
